item.title: Why 16 Should Be the Minimum Age for Social Media
item.description: Why the Minimum Age for Social Media Should Be Raised to 16 The current minimum age for social media is 13, but many experts believe that this is too young. There is a growing body of research that suggests that social media can have negative effects on young people, including increased anxiety, depression, and cyberbullying.
